title: Back-end Lead (Ruby or NodeJS)
description:
As a Tech Lead for HighFi, you are responsible for the development of the platform to fulfill business and companies/users requirement. You have to decide and pick the right technologies to implement and then lead the development team with both good process and vision.

•	Design the systems with careful technologies decision
•	Translate from business requirement to technical requirement efficiently and clearly to bridge the gap for the development team to deliver business value.
•	Oversee the development process and technical implementation
•	Quality control of new release and gradually automate all the testing
•	Lead and grow the development team on both quality and size.
•	Provide estimations and coordinate with Product Managers to deliver the Product Roadmap and Timeline. 
•	Working closely with Customer Success and Merchant Operation team to understand users’ feedbacks, business requirement and most importantly how to build the product users love.
requirements:
•	Ability to write / review a clean / scalable codebase.
•	Experience in designing scalable system, from simple to complex
•	Good estimation skills
•	An experienced team leader with good ability to define the project's vision and keep the team follow that vision
•	Having the idea of various software development processes (agile, waterfall)
•	Experience in full software development life cycle, from the beginning (setup project, estimation, choosing tech stack…) to set up infrastructure, rolling out, production debugging and monitoring.
•	Positive can-do attitude with infectiously high energy levels
•	Prior to startup exposure strongly preferable
•	Strong communication skills in Vietnamese and preferably English
•	Strong team player with the ability to form effective working relationships with a large variety of stakeholders
